prompt_markdown: Explain the difference between a **program** and a **process**. What happens when you run an executable file?

criteria.name: distinction
criteria.description: Clearly distinguishes program (static, on disk) from process (running instance)

criteria.name: lifecycle
criteria.description: Mentions process creation steps (loading, memory allocation, execution)

criteria.name: clarity
criteria.description: Uses correct terminology and clear language

expected_key_points: program is static code stored on disk
process is a running instance of a program
multiple processes can run the same program
OS allocates resources (memory, PID) when creating a process
common_mistakes: not mentioning that processes have state
